snippet.title: Kowloon's Curse - Kickstarter trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter launches on March  23rd!

From Studio [notes.] comes Kowloon’s Curse, a new type of horror RPG.

Kowloon's Curse is a turn-based horror RPG inspired by Japanese adventure games from the Dreamcast era.

Kowloon's Curse Kickstarter:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/kowloonscurse/kowloons-curse

Studio [notes.] Twitter:
https://twitter.com/studio_nts
Kowloon’s Curse Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Triumph_Corp
Kowloon’s Curse Demo:
